_metadata.description: PARAMETERIZATION CONSTITUTION - The definitive source of truth for normative, transitional, and legacy artifacts in the F.A.R.F.A.N mechanistic policy pipeline
_metadata.purpose: Defines which artifacts are normative (source of truth), transitional (pending validation), or legacy (deprecated). Establishes numeric invariants that must hold. Controls repository mode (STRICT vs DESIGN).
_metadata.authority: This file is THE LAW. No artifact may be treated as normative unless listed in normative_artifacts. No invariant may be changed without regenerating the corresponding source report.
_metadata.modification_policy: This constitution may ONLY be modified as part of a dedicated 'constitution update' task with full audit trail.

mode_description.STRICT: All artifacts must be in normative_artifacts to be treated as source of truth. Invariants are immutable. Changes require regeneration of source reports.
mode_description.DESIGN: Allows exploratory changes to parameters and thresholds for experimentation. Invariants may drift. Use only during active development phases.

current_mode_rationale: System is in production. Parameterization and calibration are complete. All changes must follow constitutional process.

constitutional_rules.rule_1_normative_authority: You may not treat any artifact as normative unless it appears in normative_artifacts.
constitutional_rules.rule_2_no_direct_edits: You may not edit PARAMETERIZATION_CONSTITUTION.json directly in normal work. It may only be changed as part of a dedicated 'constitution update' task, with a full audit.
constitutional_rules.rule_3_invariant_immutability: You may not change any invariant without regenerating the corresponding source report under a dedicated jobfront.
constitutional_rules.rule_4_reinterpretation_forbidden: You are not allowed to 'reinterpret' facts stated in source reports. You must obey them.
constitutional_rules.rule_5_validation_gate: Transitional artifacts may not be treated as fully normative until their validation criteria are satisfied.
constitutional_rules.rule_6_legacy_prohibition: Legacy artifacts must never be used as sources of truth, even if they still exist in the repository.
